habitat_description:
In the summer, the whip-poor-will utilizes forest and open woodlands, both arid and humid, from lowland moist and deciduous forest to montane forest and pine-oak association (AOU 1983). In addition, this species may be found in dry deciduous or mixed forests with little or no underbrush throughout most of its range (Cink 2002). 

A Casey 25mar10
